wow, you saw this?: The calculator is very simple. After */calculate*, put in your **expression**. For each variable you want to declare that's used in the expression, add a semi-colon (;) followed by `name = value`. For example, */calculate 8a^2 - 4;a = 2b;b=9*. Variables can reference other variables
